= Food Bucket =

We tried the store bought bird feeders but found they are prone to spillage and getting tipped over. 


= Modified Mason Jar Feeder = 

We found the mason jar style feeder got tipped over to often and caused a lot of spillage from our chicks. So we created a new version to reduce the spillage and increase the capacity. 

== Parts List == 

 # Metal mason jar feeder
 # 2 inch to 1 inch PVC coupling
 # 2 foot piece of 1 inch PVC
 # 2 foot piece of 2 inch PVC
 # 2 inch to drain adapter
 # 5 gallon or similar buck with top. 

= Instructions =

 # Cut two pieces of the 1 inch PVC. 
  # 1.5 inch piece for crumbles
  # 1 inch piece for pellets
 # File off edges of coupling and press into metal feeder
 # Drill two pilot holes in metal and coupling for two screws
 # Press 2 inch PVC into coupling and screw in place
